Module io.netty.codec.http2
Package io.netty5.handler.codec.http2

Class DecoratingHttp2ConnectionDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty5.handler.codec.http2.DecoratingHttp2ConnectionDecoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Http2ConnectionDecoder, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    @UnstableApi
public class DecoratingHttp2ConnectionDecoder
extends Object
implements Http2ConnectionDecoder
    Decorator around another Http2ConnectionDecoder instance.
